name: Final Wave
description:
STORY

ANH-MK-1: "HQ, this is ANH-MK-1 requesting immediate warp to... hell, anywhere but here. I've killed the hive queen and sustained heavy damage to most of my weapon systems."

HQ: "Your request has been heard loud and clear ANH-MK-1... but there's a problem. The main loop is down and will take about 5 minutes to repair."

ANH-MK-1: "Tell maintenance to hurry up! I can't shake these bugs for much longer!"

HQ: "Roger that... godspeed soldier. HQ out."

CONTROLS
  • Use W A S D to steer your ship.
  • Press ESC to pause.
HOW TO PLAY
  • Try not to let the bugs damage your ship.
  • Your health will not regenerate, make it last!
  • Your shield can be regenerated with the shield regeneration powerup.
  • Your health will not take damage until your shield is down.
  • Bugs may drop powerups upon death, such as:
    • Shield regeneration
    • Extra projectiles
  • Once your health drops to 0, you lose!
  • You win once the "warp drive ready" counter reaches 0.
DEV NOTES

No sound you ask? There is no sound in space :)
